TextBlock.Text: KATHERYNE: This is one goofy solar system. A planet, orbiting a star, orbiting a black hole?
KATHERYNE: Oh my, it's a filled coordinate, with no secondary engraving! That must mean there are no more coordinates! It goes bottom left, bottom right, top right, then middle left.
BILLY: *gasp* So that must mean we have the last coordinate! We must return to Wher immediately!
